mdRecord.dcterms:description: built for Hamilton McKown Twombly and his wife, Florence Adele Vanderbilt, a member of the Vanderbilt family. Italianate gardens designed by Frederick Law Olmsted Sr. Now part of the Florham Campus of Fairleigh Dickinson University, the mansion is one of the ten largest houses in the United States. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florham [work]
